books.title: Animal Farm
books.author: George Orwell
books.info: Animal Farm is a beast fable, in the form of a satirical allegorical novella, by George Orwell, first published in England on 17 August 1945.

books.author: George Orwell
books.info: Nineteen Eighty-Four is a dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale by English writer George Orwell.

books.title: Lord of the Flies
books.author: William Golding
books.info: Lord of the Flies is a 1954 novel by the Nobel Prize-winning British author William Golding.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.info: Brave New World is a dystopian novel by English author Aldous Huxley, written in 1931 and published in 1932.
